detail_desc: Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details. Hood, zip down the front, long sleeves with ribbing and thumbholes at the cuffs and a chest pocket with a taped zip. Rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Wide, 5-pocket jeans in slightly stretchy cotton denim. Tight fit at the top with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Purl-knit jumper in a cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Fitted strappy top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a low-cut back.
Straight-cut dress in an airy viscose weave with a round neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered detail on one side and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Sweatband in a cotton weave.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft brushed inside to help retain warmth.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset and a string back.
Fabric-covered hair elastics with a bow.

Oversized jacket in cotton denim with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Long-sleeved, fitted top in an airy wool knit with a drawstring in the sides.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy jersey with wide ribbing for best fit over the tummy.
Velour joggers with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed jersey hems.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with a decorative bow on the shaft. Unlined.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips. High waist with laser-cut edges, wide lace at the sides and a lined gusset.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Velour soft toy wearing a removable Santa dress and sewn-on Santa hat. Polyester filling. Size approx. 22 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with a polo neck, concealed press-studs on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.

Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover at the front, elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Scalloped lace trims at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless top in a viscose crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, elasticated, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and smocking at the back.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with concealed buttons down the front, a stand-up collar with decorative gathers at the front and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathered sections front and back, narrow elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with a slit at the hems. Some of the cotton content of the jeans is recycled.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in washed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and deep armholes in a wide style with a decorative seam at the back. Raw-edge, rounded hem that is short at the front and longer at the back.
Reversible bucket hat in cotton twill with one patterned side and one side in a solid colour. Embroidered eyelets at each side.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey with decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Top in jersey crêpe with short, scallop-edged sleeves and a cut-out pattern and scalloped edge at the hem.
Fully-lined, underwired bikini top in a push-up balconette style with moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trims at the back, side support and adjustable, removable shoulder straps.

Soft nursing bra in organic cotton jersey with padded cups with removable inserts and opening, jersey-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Sports socks in a cotton blend.

Peep-toed platform ankle boots with a cut-out section and an ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle. Covered heels and platform, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 1 cm, heel 11 cm.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Lace racer back, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastening at the front.
Soft jeans in washed, stretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a press-stud at the waist and a fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Suede platform sandals with block heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a covered metal buckle. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7 cm.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long, fitted jersey top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Silver-plated hoop earrings covered with faceted sparkly stones. Diameter 2.4 cm.
Ballet shoes in soft satin. Concealed elastic strap over the foot with a bow on top and concealed elastication around the opening. Soft cotton jersey linings and insoles, and suede soles.
Metal hoop earrings with small, rhomboid-shaped pendants at the bottom. Diameter approx. 4 cm.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Loafers in velour with textile linings, quilted satin insoles and fluted soles.
Short skirt in crinkled chiffon with flounced tiers and a high waist with wide smocking. Jersey lining.
Boxy jumper with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jacket in a soft viscose blend with a drawstring hood, zip and front pockets. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bikini briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Double-breasted pea coat in wool-blend twill with a wide collar and lapels with decorative buttonholes in a contrasting colour. Detachable metal brooches decorated with faceted plastic beads. Single vent at the back. Lined.
Shorts in woven fabric. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Knitted jacket with a soft pile lining, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with lace sections at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

V-neck blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a drawstring and decorative gathers at the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a seam at the hem with a flounce that is slightly shorter at the front.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High stand-up collar with a zip at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Sleeve pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud. Soft brushed inside.

Fitted, knee-length, boat-necked dress in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature and 3/4-length dolman sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in embroidered mesh with gathers at the top and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Spacious handbag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top. Three inner compartments, one with a zip, and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size 15x30x36 cm.
Top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly rounded hem.
Short V-neck dress in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Off-the-shoulder top in sturdy cotton jersey with short balloon sleeves in woven fabric with narrow elastication, and a sewn-on tie in woven fabric at the hem.
Trainers with hook and loop fasteners at the top and a lightly padded edge around the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with a jersey-lined hood, zip at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
